Mithril darts are Ranged throwing weapons made from mithril that are only available to members. Mithril darts require level 20 Ranged to wield. They can be obtained by either using the Smithing and Fletching skills or trading with another player. Mithril darts can be poisoned and can be wielded with a shield or prayer book for protection.

Mithril darts are one of the most cost effective Ranged training weapons for lower level players, as they have an extremely quick rate of fire and cost very little compared to similar training methods like throwing knives or arrows. They can be bought in large numbers from the Grand Exchange, costing less than half of what similar tier ranged ammunition costs.

To create mithril darts the player must have completed The Tourist Trap quest and have at least level 54 Smithing and level 52 Fletching. Players can smith mithril bars into mithril dart tips. Each mithril bar creates 10 mithril dart tips and gives the player 50 Smithing experience. Feathers or Stripy Feathers then must be added to create the mithril darts. 11.2 Fletching experience is rewarded per mithril dart.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 June 2021
(update)

The mithril dart's ranged bonuses has been changed:

  • Ranged Attack bonus decreased from +8 to 0.
  • Ranged Strength bonus increased from +7 to +9.
22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril dart(+)" to "Mithril dart(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Mithril dart(s)" to "Mithril dart(p++)".

'''Mithril darts''' are [[Ranged]] [[throwing weapons]] made from [[mithril equipment|mithril]] that are only available to [[members]]. Mithril [[dart]]s require level 20 Ranged to wield. They can be obtained by either using the [[Smithing]] and [[Fletching]] skills or trading with another player. Mithril darts can be [[poison]]ed and can be wielded with a [[shield]] or [[prayer book]] for protection.

Mithril darts are one of the most cost effective Ranged training weapons for lower level players, as they have an extremely quick rate of fire and cost very little compared to similar training methods like [[throwing knives]] or [[arrow]]s. They can be bought in large numbers from the [[Grand Exchange]], costing less than half of what similar tier ranged ammunition costs.

To create mithril darts the player must have completed [[The Tourist Trap]] quest and have at least level 54 Smithing and level 52 Fletching. Players can smith [[mithril bar]]s into [[mithril dart tip]]s. Each mithril bar creates 10 mithril dart tips and gives the player 50 Smithing experience. [[Feather]]s or [[Stripy feather|Stripy Feathers]] then must be added to create the mithril darts. 11.2 Fletching experience is rewarded per mithril dart.
